signature:
public StringBuffer format(final Object obj, final StringBuffer toAppendTo,
            final FieldPosition pos)
name: format
javadoc:
/**
 * Formats an object using a specified {@link Formatter} and appends the formatted
 * string to the given buffer.
 *
 * @param obj the object to be formatted
 * @param toAppendTo the StringBuffer to which the formatted string will be appended
 * @param pos the FieldPosition indicating where in the format specifier the field was found
 * @return the StringBuffer passed as a parameter to this method, with the formatted
 *         string appended to it.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Formats an object using a specified {@link Formatter} and appends the formatted
 * string to the given buffer.
 *
 * @param obj the object to be formatted (can be any type of object)
 * @param toAppendTo the StringBuffer to which the formatted string will be appended
 * @param pos the FieldPosition indicating where in the format specifier the field was found
 * @return the StringBuffer passed as a parameter to this method, with the formatted
 *         string appended to it.
 */

name: getFormatter
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the current formatter instance.
 *
 * @return the current formatter instance
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Retrieves the currently configured format object, which is used for formatting output.
 *
 * @return the current format object, or null if no format has been set
 */

name: getParser
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the parser associated with this object.
 *
 * @return the parser
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the parser associated with this object, which is used to format data according to specific rules and conventions.
 *
 * @return the parser instance associated with this object
 */

signature: public Object parseObject(final String source, final ParsePosition pos)
name: parseObject
javadoc:
/**
 * Parses an object from a given source string using the specified position.
 *
 * @param source The source string to be parsed.
 * @param pos The current parsing position.
 * @return The parsed object.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Parses an object from a given source string using the specified position,
 * delegating the actual parsing to the underlying {@link Parser} instance.
 *
 * @param source The source string containing the data to be parsed.
 * @param pos The current parsing position, indicating where in the source string
 *            to start parsing. This position is updated by the parser as it
 *            consumes input from the source string.
 * @return The object parsed from the source string at the specified position,
 *         or null if no object can be parsed at that position.
 */

signature: public String reformat(final String input) throws ParseException
name: reformat
javadoc:
/**
 * Re-formats a string into a specific format.
 *
 * @param input The input string to be reformatted.
 * @return The re-formatted string.
 * @throws ParseException If there is an error parsing the input string.
 */
